fields.documentation: An integer that describes the access setting of the profile: 1-Private, 2-Friends only, 3-Friends of Friends, 4-Users Only, 5-Public
fields.name: communityvisibilitystate

fields.documentation: If set to 1 the user has configured the profile.
fields.name: profilestate

fields.documentation: A unix timestamp of when the user was last online.
fields.name: lastlogoff

fields.documentation: The URL to the user's Steam Community profile.
fields.name: profileurl

fields.documentation: The user's status: 0-Offline (Also set when the profile is Private), 1-Online, 2-Busy, 3-Away, 4-Snooze, 5-Looking to trade, 6-Looking to play
fields.name: personastate

fields.documentation: The 64 bit ID of the user's primary group.
fields.name: primaryclanid

fields.documentation: A unix timestamp of the date the profile was created.
fields.name: timecreated

fields.documentation: ISO 3166 code of where the user is located.
fields.name: loccountrycode

fields.documentation: Variable length code representing the state the user is located in.
fields.name: locstatecode

fields.documentation: An integer ID internal to Steam representing the user's city.
fields.name: loccityid
